title: Quest wont complete!
body:
I watched Gen g games.. ALL OF THEM LIVE! I am watching SKT VoD right now and still nothing.
The quest claims any region... I dont watch OCE.

I watch LCK for peanut / crown and so on. So how the heck do I get this quest completed... I hate the fact that OCE is set as default not LCK.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
I have watched 5 games now.. Not one has been credited to me! I WONT WATCH OPL AS THEY ARE TRASH!

replies.body:
I'm having the same issue here, really cheesed off about it. What's the point of even having something like this if you can't even complete it? Even if the rewards aren't the best. Just the fact that there's a quest sitting in my mission tab that I can't do anything just bugs the hell out of me.

Edit: Yes, I've also done the sign-ins, I've double and triple checked but still nothing.
Were you logged in when you watched them, it won't credit it to you unless you were logged in with the account that you want the quest to complete on

thanks captain obvious, it's not like there is a big text on the screen telling you, that you aren't logged in if you do that.

No there is really a bug with some people's watch reward quests that causes them not to complete.

> [{quoted}](name=Nightjar,realm=OCE,application-id=ATM3HYki,discussion-id=HHL68ceN,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-01-20T11:58:09.104+0000)
>
> thanks captain obvious, it's not like there is a big text on the screen telling you, that you aren't logged in if you do that.
> 
> No there is really a bug with some people's watch reward quests that causes them not to complete.

I got it... It is region locked.... 
I played OCE ones on mute in the back ground while I played another game altogether. I got it done fast.

i watched an OPL vod, and it didn't work for me.
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

> [{quoted}](name=Nightjar,realm=OCE,application-id=ATM3HYki,discussion-id=HHL68ceN,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2019-01-21T09:35:55.882+0000)
>
> i watched an OPL vod, and it didn't work for me.
> {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

I feel for you. I watched all of LCK matches. { On personal note this wasnt a bad thing at all } and I did not get anything for watching. I put OPL on mute while I was playing get over it. Next thing I know.. Bang got it.
My GF was watching LCK with me and never got it either. So while we were watching LCK she played OPL. Thats why I tried it.

Yeah mine have started doing it too, it's really annoying.
On a related note, remember when Riot said they would improve missions to be more interesting? Yeah, that was a good joke

Same issue here, reported bug and the first mission completed later that day, have watched plenty since then and the second mission still isnâ€™t completing.
As someone who started last year mainly in it for the BE as I already watch the games regularly anyway.
Watched OPL, LPL and LCK games over the weekend while logged in btw.

doesn't matter if you watch OPL or not, no matter which series you watch or which VoDs you go over, some people's Watch Missions have bugged out, and will not complete.

On the plus side, the watch reward emotes this time are a bit unexciting.
